info.title: VolumeUp Referral System API
info.description: API for managing leads, commissions, and referrals in the VolumeUp partner system.

post.description: Generate an API token for admin users

get.description: Get a paginated list of leads with filtering and search capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in name, email, or company

get.description: Get a specific lead by ID

items.example: The email field must be a valid email address.

get.summary: Search for a user by referral code
get.description: Find a referral partner or admin user using their unique referral code

parameters.name: referral_code
parameters.description: The referral code to search for

message.example: User not found with the provided referral code

items.example: The referral code field is required.
